articles.content: EA Sports FC 26 is the best the series has been in years, thanks to a host of gameplay changes that deliver Ballon dOr-worthy football. Like Artetas Arsenal, you could accuse it of lacking ambition w… [+6929 chars]

articles.author: Chris Velazco
articles.title: Review | I took the new AirPods for a run. They did a lot more than play music. - The Washington Post
articles.description: I’ve spent the past two weeks testing Apple’s new Airpods Pro 3 to get a sense of what’s changed, what’s helpful and what might leave you feeling a little uncomfortable.
articles.content:
Apples very first AirPods were easy to snicker at: They sounded okay and paired easily, but were best known for looking like you had broken off some Q-tips in your ears.
